Detailed Description

Interface for all color managers.

C++ Interface: ColorManager

Description:

Author:
: Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>, (C) 2008
Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution sets some values common to all color managers, manages the function belonging to every color manager and has some typedefs for arrays of colors.

But above all, defines the interface every color manager must implement.

Member Function Documentation

void ColorManager::setColor ( const VecMath::Vector< 4 > &  x  )  [virtual]

Set current OpenGL color at given point.

Parameters:
x four-dimensional coordinate for which the color is sought
C++ Implementation: ColorManager

Description:

Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>, (C) 2008
Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution set the current OpenGL color uses HARDCODED simple algorithm to set ambient and specular values for a specific color: if halves resp. dobles them, clipping at 1.0
Todo:
make the agorithm which computes the ambient and specular values variable
Parameters:
rgb color value to be set

References ambientColorModifier, getColor(), Color::setComponentLowerLimit(), SHININESS, specularColorMinimum, and specularColorModifier.
